roleset.name: deceptive, fraudulent

example.name: Dishonest entity only
example.text: Do you honestly believe that people are never dishonest unless they are part of the Bilderburg global conspiracy ?
example.arg: unless they are part of the Bilderburg global conspiracy ?

example.name: all args
example.text: She was dishonest about her qualifications when she applied for the job.
example.arg: when she applied for the job.

roleset.note: DISHONEST-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from dishonest.01-j)
